title: Awarenessteam Introduction and Q&A
description:
In this session, the Awarenessteam will answer the following questions and more: What is the CCC Awarenessteam and how can it help me? What does it do and what does it not currently do? There will be room for your questions and for discussion.
The first and future annual meeting for new and seasoned Hall Angel Coordinators. On Day 0, we will do the first introduction. if you are new or did Hall Angel Coordination last year, please come by!Hall Angel Coordinators are the invisible hands behind a hall, besides of the Stage Manager Role, that make sure that everything Hall related especially the people changes (aka Crowd Consulting) is working and everyone finds a seat. They assist and communicate between all of the Hall Angel Teams in the lecture halls, to guarantee a smooth and entertaining program.
